//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1        s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2        s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 1, 0.5, 0, 0.0500000007
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 v3
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    texld r0, v0, s1
    add r0.xy, r0, c3.x
    mad r0.xy, r0, c3.y, -v0
    mov r1.xy, v0
    mad r0.xy, v2.x, r0, r1
    texld r0, r0, s2
    add r0.x, r0.x, c3.x
    add r0.y, c3.x, -v1.w
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c3.y, -r0.y
    mul r0.x, r0.x, v2.y
    add r0.yz, v0.xxyw, v0.xxyw
    texld r1, r0.yzzw, s3
    add r0.y, r1.x, c3.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    rcp r0.y, v4.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, v4.xxyw
    mad r1.xy, r0.yzzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c3.z
								 mov r11.xy, vPos.xy
	rcp r11.z, c210.x
	rcp r11.w, c210.y
	mul r11.xy, r11.xy, r11.zw
	mul r11.zw, r11.zw, c50.xx
    add	r12.xy, r11.xy, r11.zw
    texldl r1, r12, s0
    mov r1.x, c3.x
    add r0.y, r1.x, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.y, r1.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mad r0.y, -c2.x, r0.y, -v4.w
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c3.w
    mul_pp oC0.w, r0.y, r0.x
    add_pp r0.xyz, c0, v1
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, v3.w, v3

// approximately 29 instruction slots used (5 texture, 24 arithmetic)
